title.@value: Systemic Epstein-Barr Virus-positive T-cell lymphoma of childhood

definition.@value: This neoplasm of childhood is characterised by a clonal proliferation of EBV-infected T-cells with an activated cytotoxic phenotype. It can occur shortly after primary acute EBV infection or in the setting of chronic active EBV infection (CAEBV).

label.@value: Systemic Epstein-Barr Virus-positive T-cell lymphoma of childhood
Systemic EBV+ T-cell lymphoma of childhood
